title: "wakes" brush/marker/script
content:
Please help, this looks hand letterd in parts – the ’a’, but the ’s’ looks so familiar. Close alternatives would be a great help too, thanks.

 [‹ (x) "4200 conseillers a votre écoute" GAN black sans - Gotham {Dav}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070804103741/http:/typophile.com/node/19405 "Go to previous forum topic") [calligraphy-type script on condolences card ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070804103741/http:/typophile.com/node/19430 "Go to next forum topic")
author: lumo

comments.content: the image attachment didn’t work. try again.

having trouble “File copy failed: no directory configured, or it could not be accessed”  
this might work

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070804103741im_/http:/typophile.com/files/wakes.jpg)
Anybody out there able to help? Please.

Dom Casual is along those lines, but that s is familiar and I can’t place it.  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/dom/](http://web.archive.org/web/20070804103741/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/dom/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/dom/")

You could also look here  
 [http://bowfinprintworks.com/ScriptIDGuide.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20070804103741/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/ScriptIDGuide.html "http://bowfinprintworks.com/ScriptIDGuide.html")

Tim

You may want to take a look at some of [THESE](http://web.archive.org/web/20070804103741/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=fontsbystyle&s=13), from House Industries.  
 _\> [www.houseind.com/index.php?page=fontsbystyle&s=13](http://web.archive.org/web/20070804103741/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=fontsbystyle&s=13)_

Some more sign / brush / lettering types:  
 _\> [artandsignstudio.com/fontmenu.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20070804103741/http:/artandsignstudio.com/fontmenu.html)  
\> [www.signdna.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20070804103741/http:/www.signdna.com/)_

Dav

Thanks so far, I have already checked the following but could do with more.

Bello  
Signpainter / House Industries faces  
Churchward Brush  
Dom Diagonal /Casual etc  
OPTI Action  
MarkerFelt  
FF Market

Do you have any other letters besides this sample, to confirm that this IS a font and not hand-drawn? Without any repeated letters there is no proof that this isn’t hand lettering. I may get to eat these words, but this looks amateurish to me.

- Mike Yanega
Sorry no other characters. Thanks for evryone’s effort, there’s no need for further comments as I’ve moved on by redrawing the logo with cleaner lines.
